name: DISPERSION_PER_GUN_DAMAGE
info: Value that adds to weapon dispersion per weapon damage value.

name: GUN_DISPERSION_DIVIDER
info: Value that divides total weapon dispersion.  15 means that weapons became 15 times more accurate than default.

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_BASE
info: Sets the base max stamina value of the player, before cardio modifiers.

name: PLAYER_CARDIOFIT_STAMINA_SCALING
info: Sets the effect of cardio on maximum stamina.

name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_REGEN_RATE
info: Sets base stamina regeneration per turn of the player, before cardio modifiers.  May be used as an offset in stamina draining effects.

name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE
info: Sets base stamina burn per 100 moves of the walking player.

name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE
info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes.  Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE
info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes.  Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_SLEEPINESS_RATE
info: Set base sleepiness rate per 5 minutes.  Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base player healing rate per turn.  Default: 0.0001

name: NPC_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn.  Default: 0.0001

name: NO_FAULTS
info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.

name: NO_NPC_FOOD
info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs.  If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.

name: NO_VITAMINS
info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.

name: CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED
info: Enables CBM slots mechanics.  If true CBM slots are enabled.

name: SPAWN_CITY_HORDE_THRESHOLD
info: Minimum city size to guarantee extra zombies are spawned in cities.  0 means all cities spawn extra zombies.  Negative values disable extra city zombies.

name: SPAWN_CITY_HORDE_SMALL_CITY_CHANCE
info: Probability of a city smaller than SPAWN_HORDE_THRESHOLD having city zombies spawned, express in 'one in x' fashion .

name: SPAWN_CITY_HORDE_SPREAD
info: A scaling factor that determines how far from the center of cities extra zombies spawn, multiplied by city size, when city hordes are indicated.

name: SPAWN_CITY_HORDE_SCALAR
info: A scaling factor that determines how many zombies are spawned in cites, multiplied by city size, when city hordes are indicated.

name: SPAWN_ANIMAL_DENSITY
info: A scaling factor that determines density of wild, formerly domesticated and mutated animal spawns.

name: DISABLE_ANIMAL_CLASH
info: Disable additional spawn of large groups of monsters fighting each other on swamps.

name: SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX
info: The minimum dex required for speedydex mod to add speed

name: SPEEDYDEX_DEX_SPEED
info: The amount of moves gained per dex above SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX

name: DISABLE_ROBOT_RESPONSE
info: Disables robot spawning from alerts and from being wanted.

name: PORTAL_STORM_IGNORE_NPC
info: Portal storm enemies will ignore NPCs no matter what.

name: CRAZY
info: A boolean specifically for Crazy Cataclysm.

name: STATS_THROUGH_KILLS
info: Stats through Kills.  A mod that allows your stats to increase by killing zombies.

name: WEARY_BMR_MULT
info: What portion of BMR is used as the base for determining weariness threshold.

name: WEARY_THRESH_SCALING
info: What the weariness threshold is multiplied by to gain each successive level.

name: WEARY_INITIAL_STEP
info: What the weariness threshold is multiplied by for the first level of weariness.

name: WEARY_RECOVERY_MULT
info: What percentage of calorie intake and expenditure is reduced during each reduction tick.

name: INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE
info: The amount of INT which is used as base point for focus adjustments

name: INT_BASED_LEARNING_FOCUS_ADJUSTMENT
info: The amount of focus gained per each INT point above INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE

name: GENERIC_PROFESSION_ID
info: The profession selected by default in the character creator menu.

name: GENERIC_SCENARIO_ID
info: The scenario selected by default in the character creator menu.

name: WORKBENCH_ALL_OPTIONS
info: If false, examining workbench-type furniture will auto-execute pickup and undeploy (where applicable) actions, no crafting-related options will be listed.

name: SELECT_STARTING_CITY
info: Allows to select starting city in new character menu.

name: OVERMAP_PREGENERATED_PATH
info: Path to pregenerated overmap files.  Should include mod folder name and folder where omap files are stored.

name: OVERMAP_POPULATE_OUTSIDE_CONNECTIONS_FROM_NEIGHBORS
info: Allows to populate outside connections from neighbors.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RIVERS
info: Allows to place procgen rivers during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_LAKES
info: Allows to place procgen lakes during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_OCEANS
info: Allows to place procgen oceans during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FORESTS
info: Allows to place procgen forests during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_FOREST_INCREASE_NORTH
info: Rate at which forest coverage of the map increases to the North, based on regional map settings thresholds.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_FOREST_INCREASE_EAST
info: Rate at which forest coverage of the map increases to the East.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_FOREST_INCREASE_WEST
info: Rate at which forest coverage of the map increases to the West.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_FOREST_INCREASE_SOUTH
info: Rate at which forest coverage of the map increases to the South.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_FOREST_LIMIT
info: Caps how high the forest threshold can rise.  No cities form at values over 0.4

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_SWAMPS
info: Allows to place procgen swamps during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RAVINES
info: Allows to place procgen ravines during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_CITIES
info: Allows to place cities during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FOREST_TRAILS
info: Allows to place procgen forest trails during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_ROADS
info: Allows to place procgen roads during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RAILROADS
info: Allows to place procgen railroads during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_RAILROADS_BEFORE_ROADS
info: Defines whether to place railroads before roads.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_SPECIALS
info: Allows to place overmap specials during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_PLACE_FOREST_TRAILHEADS
info: Allows to place procgen forest trailheads during overmap generation.

name: OVERMAP_URBAN_INCREASE_NORTH
info: Rate at which urbanity of the map increases to the North.  0=no increase.  Negative numbers are technically allowed but may cause weird effects.

name: OVERMAP_URBAN_INCREASE_EAST
info: Rate at which urbanity of the map increases to the East.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_URBAN_INCREASE_WEST
info: Rate at which urbanity of the map increases to the South.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_URBAN_INCREASE_SOUTH
info: Rate at which urbanity of the map increases to the West.  0=no increase.

name: OVERMAP_MAXIMUM_URBANITY
info: How urban do we allow our megacities to go?  Mostly functions as a multiple of map settings city size.

name: OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE
info: If true, initial status and amount of fuel for all spawned vehicles will be overridden by values of VEHICLE_STATUS_AT_SPAWN and VEHICLE_FUEL_AT_SPAWN options.

name: VEHICLE_STATUS_AT_SPAWN
info: All vehicles spawn in this status.  -1 is lightly damaged (default), 0 is undamaged, 1 is disabled (destroyed tires or engine).  Values are read only if OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE is set to true.

name: VEHICLE_FUEL_AT_SPAWN
info: All vehicles spawn with this percentage of fuel.  0 is empty, 100 is fully loaded, -1 is random amount from 7% to 35% (default).  Values are read only if OVERRIDE_VEHICLE_INIT_STATE is set to true.

name: OUTSIDE_DEFINED_OMAP_OMT
info: If .omap s are being used this is the overmap terrain used outside of the defined overmaps.

name: EMP_DISABLE_ELECTRONICS
info: Whether EMP effects will permanently disable items.

name: CAPITALISM
info: NPCs will accept your bank balance as payment in trades.

name: DESCRIBE_MUSIC_FREQUENCY
info: Determines frequency (in minutes) of displaying music description in sidebar when listening to MP3-players and the like.

name: ETERNAL_WEATHER
info: Sets eternal weather.  Possible values are 'normal', 'clear', 'cloudy', 'light_drizzle', 'drizzle', 'rain', 'rainstorm', 'thunder', 'lightning', 'flurries', 'snowing', 'snowstorm', 'early_portal_storm', 'portal_storm'.  'normal' clears all eternal weather overrides and sets normal weather pattern.  Requires restart of the game after changing value to take effect.

name: SHOW_MUTATION_SELECTOR
info: When mutating, displays a menu which allows players to pick from a list of possible mutations.

name: LATITUDE
info: Sets the latitude used for sunrise/sunset times.  Defaults to Boston.

name: LONGITUDE
info: Sets the longitude used for sunrise/sunset times.  Defaults to Boston.
